name: Andy Maleh
title: Frontend Ruby with Glimmer DSL for Web
description: Glimmer is a new Ruby DSL for building web applications. It is a Ruby implementation of the popular Ember.js framework. Glimmer is built on top of Opal, a Ruby compiler that compiles Ruby to JavaScript. This talk will cover the basics of Glimmer, how to get started with it, and how to build a simple web application with it.
